welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zaragoza, Colombia! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its rich history, cultural diversity, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Zaragoza has to offer."

restaurants.name: La Guadalupana
restaurants.description: La Guadalupana is a mexican restaurant located in Zaragoza.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caucasia Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Caucasia Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
